snippet: President Obama told consumers not to be fooled by misinformation and said access to care was a right he would defend.
abstract: Pres Obama comes out fighting in defense of his health care law at event at White House, saying that he is committed to delivering its benefits on schedule, and that consumers should not be bamboozled by critics spreading misinformation about the law.

byline.original: By ROBERT PEAR and PETER BAKER

lead_paragraph: President Obama told consumers not to be fooled by misinformation and said access to care was a right he would defend.

headline.seo: Obama Vigorously Defends Health Care Law
headline.main: Health Law Is Defended With Vigor by President
headline.print_headline: Health Law Is Defended With Vigor By President

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
